comments.en: Attached documentation about Un*x install shows a telnet example. DO NOT TRY it! The printer has a decent web interface, which is available on printer\'s standard (80) http port. You can check the IP address (got from your DHCP server) by pressing the on-line button for 4-6 seconds. Default admin password is the last 6 characters (chars uppercased) from printer\'s MAC Address. (source is http://artofhacking.com/etc/passwd-oki.htm)
